name: Sleepie Cookie Eatie
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 48.
A 48-hour game jam which only one person is required to make a game from scratch. However, this is for the Jam of Ludum Dare, which takes on 72 hours instead. 

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ]

Pal is dreaming... and they are hungry!
Pal wants to eat down a treasure of cookies!!

How long will the dream last? Why not find it out yourself!

CONTROLS:

  • Movement
    • WASD / Arrow Keys: Move around
    • Left Click: Grapple Ground
    • Right Click: Grapple Item

CREDITS: 

  • @fiaKaiera – Team Leader, Art, Sound & Co-Programmer
  • @MNChino – Main Programmer
  • @Deffynite – Music

QUESTIONS: 
If you have any questions, feel free to ask from my Twitter: @fiaKaiera
